LoginForm.error: Sunan mai akawun ko kalmar sirri ba daidai ba ce
LoginForm.heading: Barka da dawowa!
LoginForm.instruction: Mun yi farincikin dawowarku! Ku shiga ciki domin ci gaba daga wurin da kuka tsaya.
LoginForm.login: Sunan mai akawun ko adireshin imel

RegisterForm.betaListSignUp: Zan so in gwada sababbin ayyuka sannan a turo mini sanarwar ta imel yayin da suka samu (na zaɓi)
RegisterForm.emailConfirmError: Adireshin imel ɗin bai yi daidai ba, a daure a sake gwadawa.
RegisterForm.emailConflict: Akwai akawun wanda yake ɗauke da wannan adireshin
RegisterForm.emailListSignUp: Ba matsala idan aka riƙa tura mini saƙon imel lokaci-lokaci (na zaɓi)
RegisterForm.heading: Barka da zuwa!
RegisterForm.instruction: A daure a ƙirƙiri akawun domin fara gudanar da bincike na ainihi.
RegisterForm.passwordConfirmError: Kalmomin sirrin ba su yi daidai ba, a daure a sake gwadawa.
RegisterForm.privacyAgreement: Kun aminta da ƙa'idar sirrantawarmu (ana buƙata)
RegisterForm.privacyAgreementError: Ana buƙatar a amince da ƙa'idar sirrantawa.
RegisterForm.realNameHelp: Za mu yi amfani da wannan domin ba ka maki a takardun kimiyya, fastoci, da sauransu.
RegisterForm.realNamePatternHelp: A sanya suna, ba adireshin imel ba
RegisterForm.underageConsent: Na tabbatar da cewa ni ne uwa/uba/mariƙi sannan na ba da dama ga yarona/yarinyata su yi rajista ta hanyar bayar da adireshina na imel a matsayin babbar hanyar tuntuɓa. Ni da ɗiyana mun fahimta sannan mun aminta da ƙa'idar sirrantawa (ana buƙata)
RegisterForm.underageEmailSignUp: Idan kun aminta, lokaci zuwa lokaci za mu riƙa turo muku da saƙon imel domin tallata sababbin ayyuka masu alaƙa da bincike ko wasu bayanai masu dangantaka da bincikenmu. Ba za mu yi amfani da bayananku na tuntuɓa ba domin cimma muradai na kasuwanci. (na zaɓi)
RegisterForm.underageNotRealName: Za ku iy amfani da sunan domin shiga ciki. Za a bayyana wa kowa. Kada ku yi amfani da sunanku na asali.
RegisterForm.underageWithParent: Idan ba ku kai shekaru 16 ba, to ku yi alama a cikin akwatin domin tabbatar da cewa kun cike fom ɗin tare da iyaye ko mariƙanku
RegisterForm.usernameConflict: An ɗauki wannan sunan mai akawun
RegisterForm.usernameHelp: Za a nuna wannan ga kowa a kan allon saƙo, misali
RegisterForm.usernamePatternHelp: Sunan mai akawun ba zai iya ƙunsar komai ba face haruffa, lambobi, '.','-', da '_'

AuthModal.title: A shiga ciki ko a ƙirƙiri sabon akawun.

FavouritesButton.add: Ƙara cikin waɗanda aka fi so
FavouritesButton.remove: An ƙara a kan waɗanda aka fi so

ZooFooter.tagLine: Binciken da Mutane Suke Tallafawa wa

ThemeModeToggle.switchToDark: Koma tsarin fuskar na'ura mai duhu
ThemeModeToggle.switchToLight: Koma tsarin fuskar na'ura mai haske
